import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; import './CreateUserForm.css'; const CreatePatientOperationReminderForm = (props) => { const {...patient} = props.patient; return (
Operation Name Operation Date Operation Time Hospital Name Hospital Address Fasting Date Fasting Start Time Estimated Cost
)}; export default CreatePatientOperationReminderForm;
